 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָסָה‎</span>] **verb** ==melt, dissolve, be liquefied== (Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***liquefy***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְסָא‎</span> ***melt away***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***dissolve, decay, coagulate***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***masû***</u></abbr> is ***wash***; see also  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מסס‎</span>); — only **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִמְסִיו‎</span> [[Josh.14.8|Josh 14:8]] (on form see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75»§ 75</sup> R.17). ***Imperfect*** sf . <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַּעמסֵם‎</span> [[Ps.147.18|Ps 147:18]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתֶּ֫מֶס‎</span> [[Ps.39.12|Ps 39:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַמְסֶה‎</span> [[Ps.6.7|Ps 6:7]] — ***cause to dissolve, melt***, ice [[Ps.147.18|Ps 147:18]] hyperb. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּדִמְעָתִי עַרְשִׁי אַמְּסֶה‎</span> [[Ps.6.7|Ps 6:7]] ***with my tears I cause my bed to dissolve***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתֶּמֶס כָּעָשׁ חֲמוּדוֺ‎</span> [[Ps.39.12|Ps 39:12]] = ***consume, cause to vanish***; figurative followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵב‎</span> = ***intimidate*** [[Josh.14.8|Josh 14:8]]. I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַסָּה‎</span>] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מסס‎</span>. II, III. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַסָּה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נסה‎</span>. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסָּה‎</span>] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסַּת‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַסְוֶה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְסוּכָה‎</span> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשׂוּכָה‎</span> see II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוך‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוך‎</span>).
